#### Scatterplot 
```{r}
# Read in data
 beer <- read.csv('Data/Beers.csv', header=TRUE)
 
# Scatterplot
 plot(Beers$ABV, Beers$IBU, xlab = "Alcohol Content", ylab = "Bitterness of Beer")
 
# linear regression model
 abline(lm(Beers$IBU ~ Beers$ABV))


```
